code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./AccessibilityTools.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AccessibilityTools(){const[fontSize,setFontSize]=useState(16);const[contrast,setContrast]=useState(false);const[open,setOpen]=useState(false);React.useEffect(()=>{document.body.style.fontSize=fontSize+'px';document.body.style.background=contrast?'#222':'#f5f6fa';document.body.style.color=contrast?'#fff':'#222';},[fontSize,contrast]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"accessibility-fab-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"accessibility-fab",onClick:()=>setOpen(o=>!o),title:"Accessibility Tools",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{role:"img","aria-label":"accessibility",children:"\u267F"})}),open&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"accessibility-popover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setFontSize(f=>Math.max(12,f-2)),children:"A-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setFontSize(f=>Math.min(24,f+2)),children:"A+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setContrast(c=>!c),children:contrast?'Normal':'High Contrast'})]})]});}export default AccessibilityTools;
